content.description: Start on a blade of granite at the base between two boulders.  Follow the diagonal crack that goes up and to the right.  Pull around the corner onto the face (the crux) and then easy climbing to the top.
content.protection: #4, #3 to start.  #1's on the upper part of the diagonal crack.  #1 or #2 on the part of the crack after you pull the corner.  An anchor can built in two cracks at the top with .75s, .5s, and nuts.
content.location: This route is a crack between the two sopwhip boulders furthest downhill on little dome (closest to echo canyon trail and lunch rock).  To access the top (on dungeon boulder) there is a wide crack (The Gates of Doom) just uphill from this climb.  Squeeze though the opening at the bottom of the gates of doom and go to the back of the cave and then climb up and go to your right.

content.description: Fun cruiser route.  At the end you exit the crack to a couple face moves to top out.  There are no bolts so anchor off the tree and down climb to exit

climbs.name: New Vulgarian
climbs.fa: April 27th 4 pm Mike Klein Ciara Hayes on belay

content.description: [[]]Climb Gates of Doom through the crux from the good stance set a high piece and face the New Vulgarian. Traverse left past the bread loaf and offset seam to access the finger and hand crack on the left arete. Don't blow the last move! Easy crack climbing lead to a final exit crux.
content.protection: .5 to 2, and a 5 and 6 camalot,  also used double ropes to manage drag and help control pendulum.

content.description: Stalker off width dehydral. Mr Crump Soloed this for the First accent. No crash pads no gear! These days consider taking 5's and 6's...
content.protection: 5 and 6's protect well. Breing your valley giant if you want something in the bottom 15'

content.description: Starts as a flared offwidth moves through each bomber size down to hands. Best feet stem on dihedral. Walk off backside.
content.location: West side of Sopwhip Boulders south facing dihedral crack.

climbs.name: Crabs in Kabul, Back Five Spaces

content.description: Wide start then deep hand jams. Nice top out.
content.location: At the uppermost boulders at Sopwhip Boulders.

content.description: Group of boulders on the slope of little dome on the west side of echo canyon.  Sunny most of the day with shade late afternoon.
